Description: Small fragment of the body of a light-brown pottery wine-jar (ostracon), the fabric contains many small white inclusions, the exterior is covered with a self-slip and faint traces of two lines of black-painted hieratic text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393471) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393471)
